Configuration.Name: Voyager OPAC Search
Configuration.Author: Atlas Systems, Inc.
Configuration.Description: Performs a Voyager OPAC title search with option for a keyword search as well. Once on a results page, Import Info will copy the call number and location values.

Setting.name: OPACURL
Setting.Description: The URL for your Voyager OPAC. (i.e. http://catalog.princeton.edu)

Setting.name: TomcatWebvoyage
Setting.Description: Indicates if the catalog uses Tomcat Webvoyage if true. When false, the Classic WebVoyage is used.

Setting.name: TomcatLocationLabelSpanClass
Setting.Description: The CSS class for the span surrounding the location label. e.g. Location:

Setting.name: TomcatLocationValueSpanClass
Setting.Description: The CSS class for the span surrounding the location value. e.g. LAW Library

Setting.name: TomcatCallNumberLabelSpanClass
Setting.Description: The CSS class for the span surrounding the call number label. e.g. Call Number:

Setting.name: TomcatCallNumberValueSpanClass
Setting.Description: The CSS class for the span surrounding the call number value. e.g. HN59.2 .S624 2000

Setting.name: ClassicKeywordValue
Setting.Description: The value for the keyword search option for Classic WebVoyage. e.g. <OPTION SELECTED VALUE="FT*">Keyword</OPTION>
